languages.text: Глейто пережил вмешательство в систему имплантов, и теперь его синхронизация с Соломоном нарушена. Можно лишь догадываться, как сильно это тяготит проктора.
Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.
languages.original_text: Глейто пережил вмешательство в систему имплантов, и теперь его синхронизация с Соломоном нарушена. Можно лишь догадываться, как сильно это тяготит проктора.

traits.locale_text: Glaito survived the tampering with his implants, and now his connection with Solomorne is disrupted. One can only guess how much this is affecting the Proctor.
Glaito survived the tampering with his implants, and now his connection with Solomorne is disrupted. One can only guess how much this is affecting the Proctor.
Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and broken his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.
Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and broken his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.
Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.
Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

languages.text: Jemand hat Glaitos Implantate manipuliert und seine Verbindung mit Solomorne gestört. Man kann nur erahnen, wie sehr das den Proktor belastet.
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: Jemand hat Glaitos Implantate manipuliert und seine Verbindung mit Solomorne gestört. Man kann nur erahnen, wie sehr das den Proktor belastet.

languages.text: Quelqu'un a saboté les implants de Glaito pour rompre sa connexion à Solomorne. Cette situation doit être très difficile à vivre pour le proctor.
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: Quelqu'un a saboté les implants de Glaito pour rompre sa connexion à Solomorne. Cette situation doit être très difficile à vivre pour le proctor.

languages.text: 有人对格雷托的植入物动了手脚，扰乱了它与索罗蒙之间的联结。可想而知，这对索罗蒙而言会是何等沉重的打击。
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: 有人对格雷托的植入物动了手脚，扰乱了它与索罗蒙之间的联结。可想而知，这对索罗蒙而言会是何等沉重的打击。

languages.text: Alguien ha manipulado los implantes de Glaito para interrumpir su comunicación con Solomorne. Es difícil imaginar cuánto afecta esto al Procurador.
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: Alguien ha manipulado los implantes de Glaito para interrumpir su comunicación con Solomorne. Es difícil imaginar cuánto afecta esto al Procurador.

languages.text: 誰かがグライトのインプラントを改ざんし、ソロモーンとの接続を妨害した。このことが代理人の心にどれほど重くのしかかっているか、ただ想像するほかない。
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: 誰かがグライトのインプラントを改ざんし、ソロモーンとの接続を妨害した。このことが代理人の心にどれほど重くのしかかっているか、ただ想像するほかない。

languages.text: Birisi Glaito'nun implantlarıyla oynayıp Solomorne'la olan bağlantısını bozmuş. Bunun Üsteğmen'in ne kadar canını yaktığını hayal etmesi pek güç.
languages.original_text: Someone has tampered with Glaito's implants and disrupted his connection with Solomorne. One can only imagine how much this is weighing on the Proctor.

traits.locale_text: Birisi Glaito'nun implantlarıyla oynayıp Solomorne'la olan bağlantısını bozmuş. Bunun Üsteğmen'in ne kadar canını yaktığını hayal etmesi pek güç.
